title: This Boring AMD GPU is IMPORTANT!  Radeon RX 5500 Explained
description: The Radeon RX 5000 GPUs are being released and announced today but a lot of gamers will find them pretty boring.  While we can't publish a review yet, let's discuss why the RX 5500 and RX 5500M might be two of the most important RDNA-based GPUs of 2019.    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  DeepCool Castle 240EX:   DeepCool Castle 360EX:    Subscribe    We were brief on this GPU beforehand by AMD.  This video is sponsored by DeepCool. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #rx5500 #rx5500m #hardwarecanucks
